overview: «The Cuckoo Calls» tells a story of Barry, a bird who lives and works together with his friendly robot companion. Until one day a bird from the outside world is calling Barry to join him outside. At this point Barry will be faced with the conflict of wanting to explore the outside world but also wanting to stay with the robot in his comfortable happy bubble. Even though the robot is sad about the bird wanting to leave, he knows he has to come up with a solution that could work for both of them.
title: The Cuckoo Calls
